name: digioptions-viewer
description: User Driven Digital Option Markets based on Ethereum smart contracts

scripts.clean: rimraf dist && mkdir dist dist/js dist/css dist/font && cp -r node_modules/digioptions-app/assets/* dist && cp -r node_modules/digioptions-app/assets2/* dist && cp node_modules/typeface-open-sans/files/open-sans-latin-400.woff node_modules/typeface-open-sans/files/open-sans-latin-400.woff2 node_modules/typeface-roboto-condensed/files/roboto-condensed-latin-400.woff node_modules/typeface-roboto-condensed/files/roboto-condensed-latin-400.woff2 dist/font
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run prerender && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: npm run clean-js && REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version NODE_ENV=production node ./tools/browserify.js js/main.js -p [ licensify --includePrivate ] --debug -o dist/js/digioptions.bundle.js && terser --compress --mangle --comments '/Modules in this bundle/' dist/js/digioptions.bundle.js --source-map "url='http://localhost:7999/js/digioptions.bundle-$npm_package_version.min.js.map',content=inline,includeSources" -o dist/js/bundle.min.js && rm dist/js/digioptions.bundle.js && mv dist/js/bundle.min.js.map dist/js/digioptions.bundle-$npm_package_version.min.js.map
scripts.watch: npm run clean-js && npm run browserify-vendor && npm run watch-bundle
scripts.budo: npm run clean-js && node ./tools/prerender.js development && npm run browserify-vendor && npm run budo-bundle
scripts.browserify-vendor: node ./tools/browserify.js --debug -r d3-array -r d3-axis -r d3-scale -r d3-selection -r d3-selection-multi -r d3-shape -r d3-time -r d3-time-format -r d3-transition -r strophe.js/src/wrapper.js -r react-bootstrap/lib/Modal -r react-bootstrap/lib/Tabs -r react-bootstrap/lib/Tab -r react-bootstrap/lib/DropdownButton -r react-bootstrap/lib/NavDropdown -r react-bootstrap/lib/MenuItem -r react -r web3 -r web3-utils -r react-dom -r redux -r prop-types -r react-redux -r react-router-redux -r history/createBrowserHistory -r elliptic -r bn.js -r buffer -r readable-stream -r asn1 | exorcist dist/js/vendor.min.js.map > dist/js/vendor.min.js
scripts.browserify-bundle: node ./tools/browserify.js --debug js/main.js                                                                --debug --extension=js --full-paths --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Modal --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tabs --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tab --external=react-bootstrap/lib/DropdownButton --external=react-bootstrap/lib/NavDropdown --external=react-bootstrap/lib/MenuItem --external d3-array --external d3-axis --external d3-scale --external d3-selection --external d3-selection-multi --external d3-shape --external d3-time --external d3-time-format --external d3-transition --external strophe.js/src/wrapper.js --external react --external web3 --external web3-utils --external react-dom --external redux --external prop-types --external react-redux --external react-router-redux --external history/createBrowserHistory --external elliptic --external bn.js --external buffer --external readable-stream --external asn1 | exorcist dist/js/bundle.min.js.map > dist/js/bundle.min.js
scripts.watch-bundle: watchify -v -o dist/js/bundle.min.js js/main.js                                                                   --debug --extension=js --full-paths --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Modal --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tabs --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tab --external=react-bootstrap/lib/DropdownButton --external=react-bootstrap/lib/NavDropdown --external=react-bootstrap/lib/MenuItem --external d3-array --external d3-axis --external d3-scale --external d3-selection --external d3-selection-multi --external d3-shape --external d3-time --external d3-time-format --external d3-transition --external strophe.js/src/wrapper.js --external react --external web3 --external web3-utils --external react-dom --external redux --external prop-types --external react-redux --external react-router-redux --external history/createBrowserHistory --external elliptic --external bn.js --external buffer --external readable-stream --external asn1
scripts.budo-bundle: REACT_APP_VERSION=$npm_package_version node ./tools/budo.js js/main.js:js/bundle.min.js --port 8080 --dir dist/ -- --debug --extension=js --full-paths --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Modal --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tabs --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tab --external=react-bootstrap/lib/DropdownButton --external=react-bootstrap/lib/NavDropdown --external=react-bootstrap/lib/MenuItem --external d3-array --external d3-axis --external d3-scale --external d3-selection --external d3-selection-multi --external d3-shape --external d3-time --external d3-time-format --external d3-transition --external strophe.js/src/wrapper.js --external react --external web3 --external web3-utils --external react-dom --external redux --external prop-types --external react-redux --external react-router-redux --external history/createBrowserHistory --external elliptic --external bn.js --external buffer --external readable-stream --external asn1
scripts.browserify-bundle-disc: NODE_ENV=production node ./tools/browserify.js                                                                  --extension=js --full-paths --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Modal --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tabs --external=react-bootstrap/lib/Tab --external=react-bootstrap/lib/DropdownButton --external=react-bootstrap/lib/NavDropdown --external=react-bootstrap/lib/MenuItem --external d3-array --external d3-axis --external d3-scale --external d3-selection --external d3-selection-multi --external d3-shape --external d3-time --external d3-time-format --external d3-transition --external strophe.js/src/wrapper.js --external react --external web3 --external web3-utils --external react-dom --external redux --external prop-types --external react-redux --external react-router-redux --external history/createBrowserHistory --external elliptic --external bn.js --external buffer --external readable-stream --external asn1 js/main.js | terser -c -m | discify --open
